# rankr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

`rankr` is a collection of functions for multivariate rank based depths and outlyingness.

## Installation

`rankr` is still at an early experimental stage. You can install the development version
of `rankr` from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("otsegun/rankr")
```
